import React, { useState, useEffect, FC } from 'react' import '../styles/NavBar.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { faHeart, faCartShopping, faHatWizard, faMagnifyingGlass, faUser, faBars, faX, faHouse, faAngleRight, faShoppingCart } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faWolfPackBattalion } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; // Example import from the brands style import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; interface NavBarProps { windowWidth: number, } const NavBar: FC = ({ windowWidth }) => { const [drawerOpen, setDrawerOpen] = useState(false) const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState('') const wishList: number = 10; const shoppingCartList: number = 10 const navigate = useNavigate() const handleDrawerOpen = () => { setDrawerOpen(true) } const handleDrawerClose = () => { setDrawerOpen(false) } const navigateToHome = () => { navigate('/') } const handleSearch = (e: any) => { e.preventDefault(); navigate(`/shop/search?q=${searchQuery}`) } return (
    e.preventDefault()}>All Products e.preventDefault()}>Best Sellers e.preventDefault()}>Men e.preventDefault()}>Women e.preventDefault()}>Jewelery

Virtual Emporium

setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} type='text'/>
{windowWidth >= 800 ? (
) : (
handleDrawerOpen()}>
)} {windowWidth <= 800 && (
handleDrawerClose()}> Close
    Home
    Log in or Register
    Wishlist {wishList && ( {wishList} )}
    Cart {shoppingCartList && ( {shoppingCartList} )}
    ALL PRODUCTS e.preventDefault()}/> BEST SELLERS e.preventDefault()}/> WOMEN e.preventDefault()}/> MEN e.preventDefault()}/> JEWELERY e.preventDefault()}/>
)}
) } export default NavBar
